name: Project Boost (Haruki1337)
description:
Controls: 

A (left) & D (right) to rotate, Space bar to "boost". 

You start at level 1 upon death.

This is just a super simple rocket boost type game, contains 7 unique levels. 

Each level has different obstacles, and the game will continue to loop through all levels. 

You'll have to close the browser tab to end the game.

I made this following a Udemy course from https://www.gamedev.tv/. 

Not meant to be anything serious, just a learning experience for myself.
